channel.title: CXL on PMem.io
channel.description: Recent content in CXL on PMem.io

item.title: Exploring the Software Ecosystem for Compute Express Link (CXL) Memory
item.description: CXL Software ecosystem The Compute Express Link (CXL) is going to be a transformative new technology in the heterogeneous memory space. While the transition from Persistent Memory (PMem) to CXL.mem may seem challenging at first, developers who have optimized their applications for PMem will find that no significant changes may be required. In this article, we will explore the CXL software ecosystem and its compatibility with the established PMem concepts and libraries.
